title: Best of The Program | Guests: Dr. Voddie Baucham, Matt Ridley, & Emmanuel Cafferty  | 6/18/20
description:
Former pastor Dr. Voddie Baucham explains how ethnic Gnosticism forms the religious basis of ‘anti-racism’ and argues why modern social justice is a Marxist, anti-Christian idea. Matt Ridley, author of “How Innovation Works,” reviews the latest on the coronavirus and whether it could become another variant of common cold. San Diego resident Emmanuel Cafferty speaks out after a social media mob got him fired by wrongly accusing him of flashing a racist gesture, and he just wants his job back.
